text: Hoya manipurensis is an oleander plant species. It was first described by Debendra Bijoy Deb. Hoya manipurensis belongs to the genus "Hoya". It belongs to the family of oleander plants. No subspecies are listed in the Catalog of Life.Hassler M. (2019). World Plants: Synonymic Checklists of the Vascular Plants of the World (version Nov 2018). In: Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life, 2019 Annual Checklist (Roskov Y., Ower G., Orrell T., Nicolson D., Bailly N., Kirk P.M., Bourgoin T., DeWalt R.E., Decock W., Nieukerken E. van, Zarucchi J., Penev L., eds.). Digital resource at www.catalogueoflife.org/annual-checklist/2019. Species 2000: Naturalis, Leiden, the Netherlands. ISSN 2405-884X. == References == Deb, 1955 In: Journ. Ind. Bot. title: Hoya manipurensis
